snippet: Shawali Khan’s case was notable because he pursued a habeas corpus lawsuit even after he was no longer in United States custody....
abstract: Federal Judge John D Bates rejects habeas corpus lawsuit filed by former Guantanamo detainee Shawali Khan seeking court ruling that Justice Dept allegations connecting him to terrorism were not based on credible evidence; Khan has since been repatriated to Afghanistan and is no longer in American custody.
lead_paragraph: Shawali Khan’s case was notable because he pursued a habeas corpus lawsuit even after he was no longer in United States custody.

headline.main: Federal Judge Dismisses Lawsuit of Former Guantánamo Detainee
